body:
Comment 3: 
I have no idea how to reproduce it. I simply can't build Go now. 

c:\Go>awk --version
GNU Awk 3.1.6

When I run all.bat in simple cmd.exe (I use clink normally - cmd.exe replacement) I got:
c:\Go\src>all.bat
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool.
go tool dist: FAILED: cmd.exe /c hg identify -b

Maybe it's time to reinstall my Windows...

Best regards,
Dobrosław Żybort
